meta.name: Text Replacer
meta.tagline: Allows you to find and replace text in your messages before sending
meta.description:
If the pattern looks like a RegExp literal, will perform replacement with regular expressions, otherwise does a literal case-insensitive match.

Regular expressions capture groups can be referred to with `$n`, and the whole match can be referred to with `$&`, inserting a literal dollar sign is done with `$$`.
meta.changelog:
1.2: do case insensitive searches when not using regular expressions
1.1: increase reliability by using commands library
1.0: the creation

ignore.description: If this text is found at the start of your message, the replacements will be disabled.
